title: Checking in on the Chickens in their New Coop

tasks.task: Updating and maintaining a winter chicken coop
subtasks: Adding more carbon (hay) to reduce smell and provide bedding
Allowing chickens to scratch and distribute bedding materials
Ensuring the coop is clean and free of chicken poop
Observing chicken behavior and diet satisfaction

tasks.task: Caring for ducks in the coop

subtasks: Anticipating the return of pig meat from the butcher
